metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3662 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects the function GetOffset of the file Ap4Sample.h of the component mp42hls. The manipulation leads to use after free. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-212002 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
